title: How one Medford man changed the way we experience music festivals
dc:creator: WBUR
description: When you go to a music festival, no matter where you are in the audience you can hear the instruments and the song lyrics. It didn't always used to be this way. And it's all thanks to Bill Hanley, of Medford.
itunes:author: WBUR
